definition: (fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉

sentences.english: This is one of many cultural chasms across the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 这只是横跨大西洋的诸多文化鸿沟之一。

sentences.english: A gulf that seemed unbridgeable was created between husbands and wives at times.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫和妻子之间不时会出现似乎无法逾越的鸿沟。

sentences.english: Second, this new system has created new social chasms.
sentences.chinese: 第二点，这一新的体制制造了新的社会鸿沟。

sentences.english: To dig an uncross able river for the one who loves you.
sentences.chinese: 为爱你的人掘起一条无法逾越的鸿沟。

sentences.english: Otherwise, we can only use the short edge of a plurality of film blocks into the gap.
sentences.chinese: 不然只能用多个膜块的短边拼接成这条鸿沟。

sentences.english: First-generation application servers made up new technologies to fill the gaps.
sentences.chinese: 第一代应用服务器用新技术填补了鸿沟。

sentences.english: Inflation has set like cement into that divide, solidifying the gap between the two Indias.
sentences.chinese: 通胀就像是水泥，巩固两种印度人之间的鸿沟。

sentences.english: To dig an uncrossable river. For the one who loves you.
sentences.chinese: 为爱你的人，挖掘一条无法穿越的鸿沟。

sentences.english: This only sets up a barrier between yourself and the speaker.
sentences.chinese: 这只会在你与说话人之间设下一道鸿沟。

sentences.english: But a yawning gap, grass nowhere…
sentences.chinese: 除了一道鸿沟，寸草也不见。

sentences.english: Unbridgeable gaps existed between these three groups.
sentences.chinese: 这三个群体间存在不可逾越的鸿沟。

sentences.english: In Snelling's case, one of those is the cultural gap between east and west.
sentences.chinese: 翠茜作品中表达的内容之一就是东西方的文化鸿沟。

sentences.english: Amongst the impersonality of the internet, this is a way of bridging the cyber gap.
sentences.chinese: 其中客观的因特网，这是一种弥合数码鸿沟。

sentences.english: But there is a gap between the aspirations of SUS and the reality.
sentences.chinese: 然而，SUS的目标与现实之间横亘着一个鸿沟。

sentences.english: The rift between recovery and prosperity is also painfully evident in housing.
sentences.chinese: 复苏与繁荣之间的鸿沟也痛苦地显现在住房问题上。

definition: to cause a wound to close up and heal
fault (geology)/CL:道[dao4],個|个[ge4]/(fig.) gap/rupture (in the transmission of some skill)/(tomography) cross-sectional
to cut apart/to sever/to separate/to isolate
